field.name: cat_id
field.label: Search Category
field.description: Select a parent category. Sub-categories of the selected category will be available for search in Filters and Advanced Search form.

field.name: showPrimaryCategory
field.label: Show Primary Category
field.description: Selecting Yes will display the primary category assigned to the listing.

field.name: showSecondaryCategories
field.label: Show Secondary Categories
field.description: Selecting Yes will display all the secondary categories assigned to the listing. This is shown in details view only.

field.name: showBreadcrumbs
field.label: Show Breadcrumbs
field.description: Selecting Yes will show the categories in breadcrumbs format.
